review: This was, by far, the best investment I've ever made!  I don't have cable, so I often use the internet to get any video content to play.  This saved me from having to run a cable from my computer to my TV/DVD player.  It's customizable so you can have your own pictures as the screen saver, setup is fast and easy, and streaming is basically seamless as long as you have a good internet connection.  What made me happiest was that, if I was working and watching a movie at the same time, I can have one tab of my internet browser streaming video content and the rest of my computer is free to use other programs or other internet tabs without sending that information to the television screen; it doesn't mirror everything on your screen, just what you tell it to.  You can also download apps to your smart phone or tablet and stream from them to your chromecast.  I highly recommend this product... for about $30 it's fantastically convenient!
